response.original_title: 実録!!ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像 23
response.overview: The 23rd installment of a popular series that introduces all 10 episodes of carefully selected horror videos that have been posted! ! So far, I've introduced strange phenomena that are reflected in home videos of ordinary households, and ghosts that have slipped into surveillance cameras. This time too, in "A Certain Toilet", it was when I visited a certain ghost spot with a friend in the middle of the night. One of my friends sensed a strange noise and opened the door ahead of the sound, and there!
response.title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video 23
